long_description: With an ergonomic design, generous gel padding and high-quality construction, the Giro Tessa women's bike gloves offer incredible bang for your buck. Super Fit(TM) engineering process tailors gloves to match the shape and size of the hand, resulting in superior comfort and performance. 3-panel palm construction significantly minimizes bunching while enhancing bar grip and feel. AX Suede(TM) microfiber synthetic leather palms, fingers and thumbs are breathable, water-resistant and abrasion resistant. Gel-padded palms absorb impact and increase comfort without compromising dexterity. Back of Giro Tessa women's bike gloves feature 4-way-stretch, moisture-wicking fabric for breathability. Soft and highly absorbent fabric along thumbs gives you a gentle place to wipe your nose/brow. Cuffs feature a rip-and-stick strap closure that hugs wrists for a secure fit; sonic-welded pull tab allows easy on/off.
